Augmenting Video Chat to Support Remote Participatory Design

Leading the development of a system to support remote participatory design sessions specifically with people with dementia. A Zoom based video chat app interfaces with devices at the participantâ€™s location (e.g. printers, projectors) via bluetooth and a Raspberry Pi intermediary. A remote researcher can trigger these devices to create physically tangible design materials in real-time for activities with participants.

Publications: CSCW 2020,
